backfillz 1.0

  • Changelog

An S4 class to represent a the backfillz plot object.

Backfillz-class.Rd

An S4 class to represent a the backfillz plot object.

Slots

theme_name

Name of current theme

theme_text_family

Text family theme option for plots

theme_text_font

Text font theme option for plots

theme_text_font_colour

Text font colour theme option for plots

theme_text_cex_title

Text size title for plots

theme_text_cex_main

Text size main for plots

theme_text_cex_axis

Text size axis for plots

theme_text_col_title

Text colour title for plots

theme_text_col_main

Text colour main for plots

theme_text_col_axis

Text colour axis for plots

theme_bg_colour

Background colour theme option for plots

theme_mg_colour

Middleground colour theme option for plots

theme_fg_colour

Foregound colour option for plots

theme_alpha

Transparency option for plots

theme_palette

List of hexdecimal colours for use in plots

mcmc_samples

MCMC samples from a bayesian model fit

mcmc_model

Text definition of MCMC model

plot_history

Data frame with overall plot history

plot_store

List containing stored plots

df_slice_histogram

Slot containing data from plot_slice_histrogram function

df_trace_dial

Slot containing data from plot_slice_dial function

df_spiral_stream

Slow containing data from plot_spiral_stream function
